title: Fossil brings its stylish Skagen Falster Gen 6 range of Wear OS smartwatches to the Indian market
content:
After launching the Fossil Gen 6 lineup of smartwatches in the Indian market last September, Fossil has now launched its Skagen Falster Gen 6 lineup in the region. The Skagen Falster Gen 6 smartwatch lineup is based on the Fossil Gen 6 smartwatches, but it has a slightly different design. If you’re in the market

The post Fossil brings its stylish Skagen Falster Gen 6 range of Wear OS smartwatches to the Indian market appeared first on xda-developers.
description: After launching the Fossil Gen 6 lineup in India last September, Fossil has now brought its stylish Skagen Falster Gen 6 range to the region.
